sentences.en: A trip through the shanty town brought home to me just how poor the people are.
sentences.cn: 我们穿过了棚户区,那是我首次目睹了真正的贫困.

sentences.en: After the shanty town was torn down, these residents moved into good houses.
sentences.cn: 棚户区拆迁后, 这些居民终于住上了好房子.

sentences.en: His order triggered a mass renovation of the province's shanty towns , which formally started in 2005.
sentences.cn: 根据他的指示,整个辽宁省的棚户改造工作在2005年大规模的开展了起来.

sentences.en: I want to quit this shanty.
Pop music can be heard 10 miles away blasting out from the huge tented shanty-town.
sentences.cn: 响亮的流行音乐从10英里之外巨大的搭满帐篷的棚户区传来。

sentences.en: She looked doubtfully at him, at the low shanty.
sentences.cn: 她犹豫不定地看着他, 看着那间矮棚屋.

sentences.en: The shanty tottered in the strong wind and fell.
sentences.cn: 棚屋在大风中摇摇晃晃,最后倒塌了.

sentences.en: The shanty towns have been devastated and the tourist industry will suffer.
sentences.cn: 棚户构成的小镇被摧毁,旅游业将受损.
单独通过难民住的小镇?

sentences.en: Workers were living in tents and shanties.
sentences.cn: 工人们住在帐篷和棚屋里。

trans.tran_cn: 简陋的小木屋，铁皮棚屋，船工号子，船歌，下等酒馆
trans.tran_en: a small, roughly built hut made from thin sheets of wood,  tin  , plastic etc that very poor people live in
